pullrequest.title: Don't shut down gazebo when removing a world -> gazebo7

content.raw:
I'm using the following loop to run the stress test:

~~~
while test/integration/INTEGRATION_world_remove ; do date >> remove.txt; done
~~~

I also have `ulimit -c unlimited` so it will produce a core file in the current folder. I can also look at the number of lines in `remove.txt` to see how many times it ran successfully. You can also extract timing from the `date` command output, but I usually just count the lines in the file.
content.html:
I'm using the following loop to run the stress test:

while test/integration/INTEGRATION_world_remove ; do date >> remove.txt; done

I also have ulimit -c unlimited so it will produce a core file in the current folder. I can also look at the number of lines in remove.txt to see how many times it ran successfully. You can also extract timing from the date command output, but I usually just count the lines in the file.
